instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 ( Your computer restarted because of a problem )
threads.message:
Hi,
i have 820-00165 mainboard
there is no liquid ,motherboard is very clean but I usually get this error "Your computer restarted because of a problem....."
I tried with a different disk, I load the operating system but it goes back to the beginning.

threads.title: 820-00165 ( Your computer restarted because of a problem )
threads.message:
There should be an history about how the problem came on; ask the client for more details.

Try first an USB macOS, disconnecting internal SSD.
Do PRAM reset, just in case.

threads.title: 820-00165 ( Your computer restarted because of a problem )
threads.message:
* no information from client
* pram reset done not changed 
* When I looked at the CPU, I noticed that one side was a little higher.
* When I try to install on a different disk via usb it gives the same error " Your computer restarted because of a problem....." 

[URL]https://disk.yandex.com.tr/i/fo62xFaSQoHqPA[/URL]

threads.title: 820-00165 ( Your computer restarted because of a problem )
threads.message:
Try known good BIOS, clean ME.
Can you run EFI ASD?

threads.title: 820-00165 ( Your computer restarted because of a problem )
threads.message: Does it work in 2015, which version should I download?

threads.title: 820-00165 ( Your computer restarted because of a problem )
threads.message:
We talked about ASD mod for this board on the forum.
No official version available.

threads.title: 820-00165 ( Your computer restarted because of a problem )
threads.message: The CPU has been clearly reworked before… history of the machine is important.
